body: This section lists conventional and commonly known talismanic components. GMs should invent many other strange and mythical components such as "the first scent of the day" or "the sound of a cat's footfall," especially for very powerful items. Note that the substances don't necessarily have identical values per unit; dragon heartblood might be worth 10 gp per drop, mithral crystals worth 10 gp per pound, and the hands of murderers worth 10 gp each.
name: Example Components
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components

sections.body: Used for metal armor, metal weapons, and items that manipulate or create earth or metal.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Adamantine Ore
sections.name: Adamantine Ore

sections.body: Salvaged from destroyed magic items, often in crystalline or powder form; used for any kind of magic item.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Arcane Residue
sections.name: Arcane Residue

sections.body: Scraped from creatures that are located deep within the Astral Plane; used for plane-traveling, teleportation, and time-manipulating items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Astral Essence
sections.name: Astral Essence

sections.body: Taken from powerful demons (though weak demons might have minute quantities); used for chaotic, evil, demon-summoning, electricity-resistance, and good- or lawful-repelling items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Demon Blood
sections.name: Demon Blood

sections.body: Taken from powerful devils (though weak devils may have minute quantities); used for lawful, evil, devil-summoning, and fire-resistance items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Devil Blood
sections.name: Devil Blood

sections.body: Used in animal-influencing and physical enhancement items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Dire Animal Brain
sections.name: Dire Animal Brain

sections.body: Used for disguise and polymorph items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Doppelganger Ichor
sections.name: Doppelganger Ichor

sections.body: Flawless, smooth bones are suitable for rods, staves, wands, and dragon-controlling items. Dragon bones can also be used for items with abilities or energy types appropriate to the dragon's breath weapon (copper dragons for slow, red dragons for fire, and so on).
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Dragon Bone
sections.name: Dragon Bone

sections.body: The freshest blood from the dragon's heart; used for any kind of magic item.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Dragon Heartblood
sections.name: Dragon Heartblood

sections.body: Taken from the remains of powerful elementals; used for items appropriate to the source's element or associated energy type.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Elemental Spirit
sections.name: Elemental Spirit

sections.body: Dusted from creatures located deep within the Ethereal Plane; used for plane-traveling and dream items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Ethereal Essence
sections.name: Ethereal Essence

sections.body: Used in scrolls and water items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Giant Squid Ink
sections.name: Giant Squid Ink

sections.body: Must be taken shortly after the murderer's demise; used for death, evil, and undead-creating items, as well as items that specifically involve a preserved hand (such as a hand of glory).
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Hand of a Murderer
sections.name: Hand of a Murderer

sections.body: Mined from places deep underground or the Plane of Earth; used for metal armor, metal weapons, and items that manipulate or create earth or stone.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Heart of the Mountain
sections.name: Heart of the Mountain

sections.body: Used for items that are appropriate to the religion associated with that symbol, items used to oppose enemies of that religion, or items especially suited for divine spellcasters of that religion (such as a phylactery of faithfulness or a phylactery of positive channeling).
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Holy_Unholy Symbol
sections.name: Holy/Unholy Symbol

sections.body: A rare crystallized form of mithral ore; used for defensive, light, and lycanthrope-repelling items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Mithral Crystal
sections.name: Mithral Crystal

sections.body: Used in metamagic and poison items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Naga Brain
sections.name: Naga Brain

sections.body: A broad category with individual uses depending on the nature of the particular herb. Nox mushrooms are used for shadow items, bloodvine for bleeding and healing items, wolfsbane for lycanthrope-repelling items, and so on.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Rare Herbs
sections.name: Rare Herbs

sections.body: Collected from long-dead stars, meteorites, and strange beasts native to the dark void; used for cold, darkness, light, and shadow items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Stardust
sections.name: Stardust

sections.body: Used in healing and regenerative items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Troll Blood
sections.name: Troll Blood

sections.body: Used intact for healing and poison-resisting wands and staves, or powdered for evil-repelling, healing, and teleportation items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Unicorn Horn
sections.name: Unicorn Horn

sections.body: Dust is taken from a destroyed vampire, ichor from an active one; used for blood, life-draining, mind-controlling, and necromantic items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Vampire Dust_Ichor
sections.name: Vampire Dust/Ichor

sections.body: Typically acquired in quantities of a pint or more; used in blood, fiend-summoning, and purity items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Virgins Blood
sections.name: Virgin's Blood

sections.body: Used in corruption and poison items.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Wyvern Poison
sections.name: Wyvern Poison
